name: BADLAND
description: A detailed single player only level for Hexen. Some devious puzzles as well as loads of action. A huge outdoor desert area, with a fort, a castle, a well, a tower and lots of dungeons and cultist places. It would have been a staggering cripple on the 486 DX2 66 I had when Hexen came out. On a Pentium, it's smooth, though.
